verses.name: Genesis 36:21
verses.text: And Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan: these are the dukes of the Horites, the children of Seir in the land of Edom.

verses.name: Genesis 36:22
verses.text: And the children of Lotan were Hori and Hemam; and Lotan’s sister was Timna.

verses.name: Genesis 36:23
verses.text: And the children of Shobal were these; Alvan, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shepho, and Onam.

verses.name: Genesis 36:24
verses.text: And these are the children of Zibeon; both Ajah, and Anah: this was that Anah that found the mules in the wilderness, as he fed the asses of Zibeon his father.

verses.name: Genesis 36:25
verses.text: And the children of Anah were these; Dishon, and Aholibamah the daughter of Anah.
